system.description:
Effect: Set-up: The user begins to glow with mystical power, gaining @Affliction[braced] 1 and healing 3 Ticks of HP.

Resolution: The user gains +2 SPATK, SPDEF, and SPD stages for 7 activations.

actions.name: Geomancy
